description: Downtown healdsburg is nearby, and the town of Windsor is just 10 minutes away by car. There are many options, but hotels will fill up fast. Book something now.
There are great meals all around from a $5 picnic to a fancy dinner.
It's wine country! There are amazing wineries and a few breweries too. Healdsburg is Zin, Saviogn Blanc, and Cab territory, but all of Sonoma is nearby
